directions: In a small bowl, whisk together lemon zest and lemon juice. Slowly drizzle in the pistachio oil, whisking constantly, until the dressing is mixed well.

In a large bowl, toss together the sliced napa cabbage, sliced romaine lettuce, parsley and basil. Mix in the dressing, salt and pepper. Gently toss until dressing is distributed evenly. Top with chopped pistachios. Enjoy!
ingredients: 2 cups thinly sliced romaine lettuce leaves
1/4 cup chopped fresh Italian flat-leaf parsley
title: Napa Cabbage Salad with Lemon-Pistachio Vinaigrette
